text: Quality of camera of this mobile is awesome. This mobile is amazing, and it's 20MP camera clicks HD photos. Good camera quality
Worst thing in this mobile phone is it's battery life. It's battery gets discharge quickly. Average performance
Mobile restarts automatically several times and Wi-Fi doesn't work for more than 5 min. Total waste of money.
This is one of the best mobiles. It has really nice features, camera, performance.
There are other mobiles in the market which are much more better than this phone.
